titleStmt.title: A general epistle to friends every where Written in obedience to the requirings of the spirit of life from God.
titleStmt.author: Parke, James, 1636-1696.

notesStmt.note: Signed: Alton in Hampshire .. the end of the 11th mon. 1682 .. James Parke.
Reproduction of the original in the Bevan-Niash Collection, Woodbrooke College, Birmingham, England.
